vkopenurldef.name: KeyCode::VK_OPEN_URL_APP_Vim
vkopenurldef.url: /usr/local/Cellar/macvim/7.4-99/MacVim.app

item.name: HHKB Leader in Emcas insert mode
Change C-jk to A-arrow key in dash
eisuu
item.autogen: __KeyOverlaidModifier__ KeyCode::JIS_EISUU, KeyCode::COMMAND_L,ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::SPACE, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L,

item.name: kana to F18
item.autogen: __DoublePressModifier__ KeyCode::JIS_KANA, KeyCode::OPTION_L, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::W, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L,

item.name: F19 to Hyper
item.autogen: __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::F19, KeyCode::MINUS, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L | ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L

item.name: Hyper+Tab To Capslock
item.autogen: __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::TAB, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L | ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L, KeyCode::CAPSLOCK

item.name: HHKB OPTION_R to Hyper
item.autogen: __KeyOverlaidModifier__ KeyCode::OPTION_R, KeyCode::COMMAND_L, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::SPACE, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L,

item.name: HHKB OPTION_L to Hyper
item.autogen: __KeyOverlaidModifier__ KeyCode::OPTION_L, KeyCode::COMMAND_L, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::SPACE, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L,

item.name: COMMAND_L to Hyper-s
item.autogen: __KeyOverlaidModifier__ KeyCode::COMMAND_L, KeyCode::COMMAND_L, KeyCode::S, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L

item.name: Hold COMMAND_L to Hyper-l

vkopenurldef.name: KeyCode::VK_OPEN_URL_KM_OPEN_DICTIONARY
vkopenurldef.url: osascript -e ' set appName to "Dictionary" set appID to bundle identifier of (info for (path to application appName)) tell application "System Events" if not (exists process appName) then tell application appID to activate else if frontmost of process appName then set visible of process appName to false else set frontmost of process appName to true end if end if end tell '
